Preparation.quote: "Prepare ye the way of the Lord, make his paths straight." (Matthew 3:3)

Purification.quote: "Blessed are the pure in heart, for they shall see God." (Matthew 5:8)

Awakening.quote: "Awake, O sleeper, and arise from the dead, and Christ will shine on you." (Ephesians 5:14)

Detachment.quote: "Let go of all things and you will find all things." (Meister Eckhart)

Emptying.quote: "Empty yourself of everything. Let the mind rest at peace." (Tao Te Ching 16)

Surrender.quote: "Not my will, but yours be done." (Luke 22:42)

Dark Night.quote: "The dark night of the soul comes just before revelation." (St. John of the Cross)

Illumination.quote: "The light shines in the darkness, and the darkness has not overcome it." (John 1:5)

Transformation.quote: "Be transformed by the renewal of your mind." (Romans 12:2)

Integration.quote: "As above, so below; as within, so without." (Hermes Trismegistus)

Dissolution.quote: "Like salt dissolving in water, the ego dissolves in the Divine." (Ramakrishna)

Absorption.quote: "The drop slips into the shining sea." (Kabir)

Embodiment.quote: "Let this mind be in you which was also in Christ Jesus." (Philippians 2:5)

Service.quote: "They serve all beings as expressions of the One." (Upanishads)

Radiation.quote: "Let your light so shine before men." (Matthew 5:16)

Perpetual Union.quote: "Abide in me, and I in you." (John 15:4)

Perfect Union.quote: "I live, yet not I, but Christ lives in me." (Galatians 2:20)
